summary: Provides an evaluator for binary sentence‑pair classification models (e.g., CrossEncoder) that computes average precision and the optimal F1 score over a set of labeled sentence pairs, integrating with the Sentence‑Transformers evaluation framework.
business_intent: Enables developers and data scientists to quantitatively assess and compare the performance of cross‑encoder models on binary classification tasks, facilitating model selection, hyperparameter tuning, and quality assurance in NLP applications.
